name: HL7 Version 2 Model Elements
title: HL7 Version 2 Model Elements
description:
This code system defines HL7 Version 2 Model Elements used for Version 2 to FHIR Translation
This subset addresses model elements used for conversion of V2-FHIR Mapping - Data Type: CQ
Source data can be found at https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=40730819

property.description: High value for cardinality, set to 2147483647 if unbounded
The V2 Datatype assigned to this model element

concept.code: There would need to be a mapping between the code system to a uri

There is no mechanism for an alternate unit, other than potentially the PQ-translation extension which is "An alternative representation of the same physical quantity expressed in a different unit from a different unit code system and possibly with a different value
